website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to high-quality anti-aging serums, you won't find a better value for the price anywhere.
pros: Uses organic hyaluronic acid to improve the look of fine lines and wrinkles
cons: Supposedly hydrating, but some users say it dries out their skin

website_summaries.verdict: A simple, yet solid, totally vegan option for those who have a tight budget.
pros: Customers notice a difference right away
Gentle enough for morning and evening use on sensitive, easily irritated skin types
cons: Does not blend well when other products, such as moisturizers or makeup, are layered on top of it

customer_reviews.title: ... serum another huge factor in why my skin is beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: Use this everyday mixed with h my drunken elephant victim C serum another huge factor in why my skin is beautiful ..... 40+ and loving it
customer_reviews.author: Keyana Womack

customer_reviews.title: Love it very much worth it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, has kept my skin tight slowly seeing results for my fine lines. I have been using it for 2 months now and stop expecting over night results with a skin care product nothing will show you progress in a week . I loved this product so much I rebought a second bottle since I’m a little passed half way already on it. Update 6 months later I’m on my third bottle and I will not trade it for anything else! I use in my 10 step Korean skin care routine and it has helped transform my skin!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Less than 1 week, I think it's working!
customer_reviews.text: So, it's Friday and I just started using the serum on Monday. Mind you, I am also trying out a derma roller at the same time. So far, I can't say I've seen a difference in wrinkles (I'm 37 and have very small, shallow ones on my forehead and around my eyes), but I have seen improvement in skin tone and softness. I was a sun worshipper through my 20s and I have sun damage on my cheeks and nose which already looks to be fading. The overall tone looks more even as well. I took before pics and if things go well I'll post them with after photos also.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O

customer_reviews.title: Great Serum for Daily Use!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it daily for almost three weeks now, my face is softer and plump, cannot live without this bae! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy H

customer_reviews.title: I use it everyday a long witg my high-end skincare
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 3 times now i use it religioulsy every night i mix it with my night cream. I bought before they even made changes to the bottle i dont know if they changed formulation but it still feels great and produce the same results im in my 20s so i dont have a lot of lines but i am starting notice i have lines on my cheek when i smile it creases which made me want to start with anti aging. Been using it for a fem months now maybe even a year and still continuing to buy it .
customer_reviews.author: Beauty by Cici

customer_reviews.title: Contains benzylalcohol DHA!!
customer_reviews.text: This product advertises as “100% hyalauronic acid” but it contains benzylalcohol DHA, a harsh chemical that can DRY out your skin. I can’t use this product but they do not accept returns. I am very frustrated and will not purchase again—I have to throw away the bottle I already have. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Calandra Lindstadt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work like Hyaluronic Acid Serum should work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work like Hyaluronic Acid Serum should work. Would not recommend. No noticeable difference. Prefer R+F Active Hydration Serum...works much, much better. Bought this product prior to release of Active Hydration Serum.
customer_reviews.author: TLCDaisy

customer_reviews.title: She puts in the WERK, henny!
customer_reviews.text: It works so well! I've been using the HA for about 2 weeks now, and my skin has felt full and smooth since! It also seems to have reduced oil production and eliminated the formation of whiteheads; I credit that to the HA helping my skin retain water and not having to produce so much oil. I put two drops into a small amount of super light moisturizer and really pat/press it into my skin twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: dry, red patches on my skin
customer_reviews.text: this is not my first time purchasing this product from this company. i loved this serum and this is the fourth time i buy it. However, this time it smelled different, but i didn'nt think to much about it, my skin started to react different dry, red patches appeared on my cheaks. but i didn'nt think it was from the serum. after a while my mom wanted to use mine cause her's ran out. she immediatly washed her face cause she could'nt stand the waful smell. i stopped using it for a week and my skin started to get better. something is off with my latest purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eman K.S.A

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: The consistency of this product is basically water, it just runs off your face when trying to apply it with the pipette – I just looked up some reviews and saw it's meant to be gel-like so either it was refilled or has the wrong ingredient in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WATER !
customer_reviews.text: This is water not pure hyaluronic acid serum. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Andee

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin dry and with a film
customer_reviews.text: You do get what you pay for ($15) AND THIS PRODUCT IS NOT AVAILABLE FOR RETURNS, just FYI. Before applying moisturizer, this product left my skin dry and with a shinny film. After moisturizer, it still left my skin feeling tight. I then tried mixing it into my moisturizer, but it still left my skin feeling strangely tight, and I didn't want to combine this with my Clinique moisturizer that was actually moisturizing. It feels like I have rubbed Elmer's glue all over my face. This is unfortunate since it is paraben and fragrance free, which are all good things to look for.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Must Check My Review To Know the product better
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 2 years, they have changed the formula of the product in this period but I still very enjoy using it every morning and night. I also made special review video about this product on my YouTube channel *Zulayla*. Make sure to check it out to get better idea about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey and Zulayla

customer_reviews.title: My forehead is proof!!!
customer_reviews.text: First review I've ever written for a product goes out to this gem. Made such a difference in my skin! My forehead is no longer covered in those gross bump, my skin is smooth, wrinkles are less pronounced, and my skin looks glowy and feels hydrated. Will absolutely continue to use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solution for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product for a couple of weeks, but it has made a huge difference to my face. I have been struggling with acne and dryness for the last couple of months and this product made huge improvens after just one use. There is no fragrance and a little bit goes a long way. I would defiantly reccomend this product to Anyone struggling with acne and dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Jacey w

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients Unknown!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a couple of months and didn't find any improvement to my skin comparing to other brands I used. One day, I accidentally left the bottle opened, and I found the residue was a transparent plastic-like material. Then, I intentionally left some serum out for dry. The claimed "Hyaluronic Acid Serum" turns into some form of plastic materials after a day. When I checked the ingredients on the bottle, no ingredient is listed on the label. I regret purchasing it for the cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: CJY

customer_reviews.title: This product goes on easy and goes straight in
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on easy and goes straight in. No residue feeling. It makes my skin feel and look firmer. I am outside a lot and my skin is exposed to the elements often. This is the best prodcut I have used for balancing out my combination skin. I find it helps control my oily patches and smoothes my dry spots. This is so much better than any cream or gel product I have ever used. It does not have a smell either, which is nice. I'm 44 and have not had any treatments or proceedures on my face and people think I have so if that isn't a testament tot his product, I don't know what is.
customer_reviews.author: Bamaneil

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and I was disappointed I read it was the top seller on Amazon and I really like the eve Hyaluronic serum that bought on Amazon so if this was the best I needed to try it , well my skin felt dry after applying I knew that's not right besides I don't have dry skin then in the morning I had two little breakouts on the side of cheek near my ear and that's another thing I never break out... so let's just say I'm afraid to use it again I'll stick with the one I first loved. "I guess don't break it, if it's not broken"
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Moore

customer_reviews.title: I have a R&F line that I use and haven’t gotten results like this. Pores are smaller And my deep forehead ...
customer_reviews.text: Umm. This stuff actually does something! I have a R&F line that I use and haven’t gotten results like this. Pores are smaller And my deep forehead lines from years of resting B**** face are definitely diminished in just days! I have super sensitive skin and have a couple of tiny breakouts so just make sure you have a solid skin routine day and night to combat that. And the bottle is bigger than I expected. 3-4 drops does face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed so far
customer_reviews.text: Ive seen no difference since ive been using this unfortunately,im going to keep using it faithfully twice a day hoping maybe it just hasnt been long enough?????
customer_reviews.author: Suziejolliff

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't worked for me..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thanks to all of the wonderful reviews but I'm actually disappointed. I've used this for about 2 weeks or so and I've not noticed any positive changes. If anything, this dried out my face more, particularly my cheeks which is not a place that I've had issues with before. I've tried using 2 pumps then lowered it to 1 and I went from applying it 2 times a day to just once a day but still noticed dryness. Not sure if I'm doing something wrong but sadly, this product has not worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It works for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 75 years old and have been using Cosmedica Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum on my face and neck for about 3 years. My cheeks and forehead are virtually wrinkle free...just a few around my mouth and eyes. I attribute this to daily cleaning and treatment with your product as well as moisturizing with pure coconut oil. My three sisters, all in their 70’s too, are jealous of my beautiful skin!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs well and is wicked lightweight. Will last a while, but I didn't see any difference after a month of regular use. Maybe it's just a preventative measure?
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Girl

customer_reviews.title: FAKE hyaluronic serum, NOT the amazing original!!
customer_reviews.text: The seller Beauty Box is selling a dilluted fake version of God knows what, it’s NOT the original Cosmedica product!! I’m furious, they highjacked the listing and I was buying their disgusting copy FOR A YEAR!! So do NOT make the same mistake! Go check and make sure the seller is COSMEDICA, the real original manufacturer of the amazing hyaluronic serum!!! It’s your health on the line!!! What the hell was I putting on my face?!?!?
customer_reviews.author: yng

customer_reviews.title: Try it for yourself to see what you think; but I'd rate this an average product
customer_reviews.text: The pump action shoots out so fast and hard it hits the wall if you don't put your hand completely over the opening. The product itself is okay I think Dr. Dense products work better but the price on this one is worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: snorkie

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product, I will say that the formula seems ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this particular product. I know there has been a lot of hype lately with hyaluronic acid, with neutrogena's line coming out first, and now everyone has it! It is a great product, I will say that the formula seems a bit different the 2nd time around and the outside labeling changed. Not that is works any differently, the consistency of the product is a just a little thicker and and maybe a bit stickier when applied but goes away. I have very sensitive skin, like ridiculously, and it does not cause any sort of reaction. I mix this with a Vitamin C serum and a Vitamin E oil and it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Caused a breakout - returning
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my aesthetician recommended I add a Hyaluronic Acid Serum to my routine. Selfishly, I didn't want to buy the one she recommended at her spa (it was over $100). I thought with the amount of good reviews here, I'd purchase this one. As with anything skin related, I knew it may not work. For me, I broke out with small white heads everywhere on my face. Nothing else changed in my skin routine other than this product. I gave it a few weeks of use and still so no difference in my skin, only the increase in acne. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin L

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't write reviews however I felt compelled to share my experience over the last 3 months of usage.... every morning and afternoon I applied a few drops to a specific area on my right forearm where my skin shows creping signs and rubbed it in with the back of my left hand.... this way I could compare forearms and hands over time.....I am sad to report that after almost 90 days there have been no changes to appearance.... Bob S
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product! My holy grail to my skin care routine!
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to new products that I use on my face I like to do my research. I read reviews, compare products and of course see what is the best bang for my buck. I have VERY oily skin. I was looking for a product to moisturize/hydrate my skin and help control my oil. I use a dermaroller and needed a product to use with it. THIS IS IT! I found my holy grail to my routine. After dermarolling I apply this Serum and then a light moisturizer. My skin hasn’t been this clear and bright in years. I’m so happy I found this product! Also it has an actual dropper which helps you not waste product.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Never buy agian
customer_reviews.text: ***please read this if you are planning to buy 4 ounce bottle*** the pump is not smooth at all and you can't control the serum. the serum will travel away on every press and you will loose big amount on the floor or mirror... I don't know if this is a defect in my bottle or with all 4 ounce bottle!!!
customer_reviews.author: ahana

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizing Serum for the price :)
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for the past 6 months and recently purchased my second bottle. The way I use it, is I cleanse my face, apply toner and then the Hyaluronic serum + moisturizer. The skin on my face ends up feeling soft and supple. I have very dry skin on most of my face and eczema so this helped a lot. It didn't irritate my skin, even when I had flare ups. My favorite thing about it, is that I feel my skin is very hydrated which I think helps sooth my dry patches and helps with the uncomfortable feeling when I get an eczema flare up. Hope this helps someone! :)
customer_reviews.author: PaperyLove

customer_reviews.title: I've used several different kinds of serums for my face and this is my favorite so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've used several different kinds of serums for my face and this is my favorite so far. I use it right after my bath when my pores are open from the hot water and then apply my moisturizer right on top of it. My face normally gets very dry in the winter, but since I began using this serum it has been a lot better. It seemed like such a tiny bottle when I got it, but a little bit of this stuff goes a long way. I've been using it for several months now and still have half a bottle left.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Saves $$$$$$!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write Amazon reviews. But I want other people to know this product really does work. Brand name serums that have a fraction of this ingredient so for five and six times as much. Don't fall for! buy this and add to just a decent everyday moisturizer or use it on its own and save yourself a ton of money! I mix mine with Cetaphil moisturizer. You can use as little as three drops. One drop of the unmixed serum around my eyes has really helped. I live in Albuquerque New Mexico USA and this is a very dry climate.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda R. Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: I finally found the perfect moisturizer for my very sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin gets extremely dry in the winter and I also suffer from some adult acne, therefore I cannot use grease products on my face. Last winter I was in the quest to find the perfect moisturizer for my skin. After reading a lot of reviews in Amazon, I finally found this Hyaluronic Acid Serum and I couldn’t be happier with this product. It hidratas my skin without leaving a greasy layer. I now use this product in my whole body! it’s outstanding, including its price!!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Great Product With Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this product but upon receiving it, I couldn’t get the pump to work. I finally did, but when I push it, it sprays product all over the place rather on my hand. I could open the bottle but I worry about contamination if I have to open it for each use. If the pump worked I’d give it top ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne C. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my Dermo at the Plastic Surgeon's Office
customer_reviews.text: I love that I was able to buy a bigger bottle this time. I am 66 with adult acne so this product helps to keep my skin regenerating so my acne can come to the surface and then heal while moisturizing without irritating my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Tchatch

customer_reviews.title: I haven't noticed any difference on my lips. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed any difference on my lips. I have noticed a slight difference on the wrinkle between my brows. Not really wanting anything else to poof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drying, not what HA should be!
customer_reviews.text: I used this nightly for about a week. I don’t typically have sensitive skin but this dried out my skin and I got blotchy, red irritated patches from it. It’s not returnable, total waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Add this to your skin care regimen.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best of the hyaluronic acid serums, yet. Really does what it's supposed to do. I have had nothing but positive results. I plan to keep it a part of my regimen. I use it twice a day, morning before makeup, evening before night cream.
customer_reviews.author: Txevey

customer_reviews.title: part of my daily routine
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered other brands of hyaluronic serum and have just started using this one. I use Vitamin C serum as well under my usual daily moisturizers and sunscreen and again at night under night cream. I love how soft and moisturized my skin feels with this serum!
customer_reviews.author: tracy a.

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out, but its been a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact its not greasy, doesn't break my skin out ( like most things do), and is easy to apply. BUT I see absolutely no difference. My neck especially after a few weeks of using this two times a day, and much more than a few drops ( more like a few drops per section of face), my neck is showing signs of age, and my sink is not plumped with moisture. I am bummed out. This has the most simple ingredients, but yield no results. I'll give it a pinch more time, hoping for something good to start working.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna JBauer

customer_reviews.title: Not Thrilled
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and thought I would give this product a try. Perhaps my late 50’s skin is beyond seeing the benefits that others experienced. My first reaction to the serum was ‘wow, it’s mainly water.’ I’ve used day and night for 4 weeks along with moisturizer and have not seen any difference in my skin. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: saitta2

customer_reviews.title: Water.
customer_reviews.text: Much like another reviewer I believe this is water and possibly some glycerin. So the good news is it's great for sensitive skin and has no smell. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: connieg

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product still freaks me out how fast it goes in I planned to use it with my Lift Wand but it doesn’t have anything in it that glides on top of the skin just goes in and plumps your skin so first use it’s “Great”
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Finishes nicely on the skin
customer_reviews.text: Finishes nicely on the skin, very light. However, did nothing for me. Could easily replace with lightweight lotion. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: RowanCSpencer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money HIGHLY disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the product for over a month now and have seen no results other then it has dried my skin out . I apply it at night and in the morning and I can not see the slightest difference I WILL NOT BUY AGAIN it does not help moisturize nor better my skin at all!
customer_reviews.author: Neeena

customer_reviews.title: Extremely drying.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely drying. Bought this for my oily T zone skin. My chin has tons of acne scars and I'm hoping that this will lighten and clear them up. My forehead, chin and nose are beyond oily and I go through about 10 blotting sheets a day. I'm hoping this helps. 2nd day of use and I have dry patches on my forehead from just rubbing a dollop of this stuff into my skin in the mornings. I'll only be using this on my chin and nose from now on. It's ridiculous that this is marketed as 'moisturizing' it's definitely not
customer_reviews.author: PaniniChowder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product to help fill in the thin lines
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different Hyaluronic Acid Serums and this one is by far the best. It holds 1000x times the moisture to keep your skin soft and feeling smooth. It doesn't have a scent so it is perfect for those people that are sensitive to perfumes. I just ordered 2 more bottles. You can't beat the price compared to all those products out there that claim to do the same thing for a lot of money and they don't work. This product works as described and better.
customer_reviews.author: K Moon

customer_reviews.title: Did I just buy a bottle of starchy water?
customer_reviews.text: I love applying serum to my face; I love that dewy, ever-so-slightly gummy feel that my skin has in the first few minutes after application. I knew something was amiss when that feeling was nowhere to be found with this product. I felt no added protection or moisturizer after giving this product multiple chances.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Snax

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.text: The first few times I used it alone, and it didn't really seem to make a difference. Then I read online that if you live in a drier climate, you should use hyaluronic acid under your regular moisturizer. Since doing that, I've noticed a difference. I've been using this for about a week or so followed by my regular moisturizer, and skin seems much more soft and even more...elastic? I have very sensitive, allergic skin, and it has not reacted to this at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Burned my face
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order in the mail and applied it to my face. My face immediately started burning and turned completely red. I tried to wash it off and it didn't help. I tried to put my face in front of a fan to help with the burning again didn't help. Then tried to put an ice pack on my face which again didn't help. I look and feel like I have a severe sunburn and you can't return this product. Be careful when purchasing this item. It's been 20 mins and I still look like a tomato.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Colangelo

customer_reviews.title: a little too watery
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different brands of Hyaluronic Acid and this is not my favorite. It feels a little too watery on my fingertips and on my skin, and my skin doesn't feel that soft after I apply it. It almost feels a little tight. Yes, I apply it after a shower/cleansing when my skin is still damp, and it still feels tight. I will probably switch back to the other brand I tried earlier.
customer_reviews.author: EmilieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Product has Inconsistent texture
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product for several years. I believe the hyaluronic acid can be helpful in retaining moisture in the skin. This product is inconsistent in its texture; sometimes it looks and feels like water. Other times the liquid is thicker, like a very thin, clear, flowing gel, and feels softer and smoother to apply. When the product presents in this form, I feel like it works better to retain moisture in my skin. Both forms are scent free and do not react negatively to my normal to dry skin. In the future I will be looking for a more stable product.
customer_reviews.author: Vonne

customer_reviews.title: Just bought my second jar!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased my second bottle! After learning about HA i looked at several department store products, all were very expensive. I found this on Amazon and decided to try it. So glad I did! It is moisturizing, doesn't feel greasy or heavy at all, and makes my skin look fabulous! I'm 52 and this product keeps me looking great even during this hot, humid Texas summer!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Company switched from GLASS to PLASTIC bottle :(
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to get my last shipment and I see that they are now packaging in plastic bottles. Fortunately I had saved my old glass bottle to pour the product into, because I hate the idea of plastics LEACHING into my face product. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: fgmom

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, I use this everyday. I find it works best when used in a full routine and not by itself, I typically always use this as my base serum followed by a spritz of pure aloe water let it dry for a few min, then layer a natural oil on top. I also use this product after dermarolling my face. Would recommend. It has a nice consistency to it as well, and zero scent.
customer_reviews.author: Xxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin? Never again!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I took a chance on ordering after hearing about how good this product was for hydrating your skin. I’ve used consistently for about 2 weeks and my skin is so moisturized. I got a sun burn recently and after a day and a half of using a sun burn after care product, I used this on my burn and I had instant relief and the burn was relieved the next day. I firmly believe this keeps your skin moisturized. I’ve always had combination skin where some areas are dry and some are oily. Now I don’t feel any dryness at all! Just dewy soft skin. I also apply down my neck and chest. I WILL BE REORDERING!!
customer_reviews.author: RaeLea

customer_reviews.title: Love the difference this makes with my skin!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did it help reduce the lines, it also leaves my face feeling smooth and soft. I have started using it on my neck, too, and it seems to be improving the great "old lady" wrinkles above the cleavage!
customer_reviews.author: Lil~Bit

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Value!
customer_reviews.text: COSMEDICA Hyaluronic Acid Serum is replacing a product by Dr. Gross that I've used for many years. Cosmedica is dispensed via a pump rather than a dropper. One pump gives you more than enough for your entire face and neck. It is non drying or tacky. The skin seems to drink it up immediately. I have not experienced any drying, redness, or flaking. I only experience smooth, hydrated skin. The value for this hyaluronic acid serum is amazing. Along with this, I also purchased the New Brightening Eye Gel which I also have given five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Carolee888

customer_reviews.title: Its so good and I don’t know why
customer_reviews.text: I found this product on one of those list that talks about cult favorites on Amazon. I figured I might as well try it. And it is pretty fantastic. I’m 41 years old and still have problems with breakouts, but nowhere near as badly now that I am using this. My skin seems to really like it. The only thing I would say is that it doesn’t work as a moisturizer for me, too. My skin tends to get too dry with it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I mix this product with all my moisturizing cremes. I have not found that I benefit from using this product by its self. As I understand it it is meant to be used mixed with other moisturizing cosmetics.
customer_reviews.author: joly

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great, now it’s watery garbage
customer_reviews.text: I actually loved this product until my last bottle came in and this particular one is basically glorified water. All others that I have purchased were great and I saw results, and my skin felt wonderful. Personally I don’t prefer serums and I loved that it had no scent and was not sticky. But with my last purchase, the consistency was so watery I’m not even sure this has any real ingredients!! Also I see absolutely no results. My skin used to feel plump, well not anymore. Who changed the formula and why? I won’t be purchasing again unless the formula is back to what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: This is a special gift from Heaven. My Doctor ask me what I had done? I ask her what ? She said your Covid diet must be amazing. I told her no I have been eating a lot of junk food. She said I must have gotten fillers. I said no we have to wear mask. I told her about Cosmedica Hyaluronic Acid she jumped on it so fast that when she came back in the room she had ordered 2 bottles for her husband and herself. Amazing stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Firegirl1239

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Terrible skin reaction!
customer_reviews.text: Beware!!! This product I has caused a horrible allergic reaction like rash on my face. I am devastated. My skin was totally clear prior to using now it’s itchy and covered in angry red bumps. The formula is not moisturize at all. On first use I thought this is really dry... I should’ve stopped right after that. Praying that I can control the itching and not scratch and damage my skin. I am so upset that this has happened. Beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Has to update my review - definitely worth 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can say that without a doubt I feel like this is better than the high-end serums that you pay $100+ for. I've been using about a week (5 days) now - twice a day and I definitely see and feel a difference. I tend to sleep on my face, which is bad. I sleep on my side and I've been noticing a line near my outer right eye, which has me feeling super conscious of it. Going to order some satin pillowcases and keep using this. Update 7/5/19: This definitely restores the moisture, plumps your skin and absorbs into your skin immediately. This is on my auto-order list permanently!
customer_reviews.author: MioRioZio

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Backs of my hands are getting wrinkled. I use this w MARY KAY deep moisturizing cream after it dries. Same for my face. Love results.
customer_reviews.author: texastrue

customer_reviews.title: Not a moisturizer, but not supposed to be one. Unbelievable results!
customer_reviews.text: This is a serum to be put on clean skin and followed up with a moisturizer. When used properly, the results are extremely impressive. I am a 60 year old woman with the skin to show it. To start with, the price of the product is very reasonable. The results after using just one time are impressive with the significant wrinkling around my eyes very much minimized. The crepe paper texture was smoothed significantly. It appears to plump up the skin similar to collagen injections but without the needle. I very much recommend this product and will continue to use it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instant hydration!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle and honestly, I can’t imagine starting or ending my day w/out this product! I’m almost 40 years old and very careful about how I treat my skin. I was looking very tired (I do have 5 kids), skin was dry, pores looked a mess! I now get second guessed by people if I’m my 16 year olds sister. I use this procur along with retinol and will add a sunscreen or night cream. However no creams I use would work the same if I wasn’t using this first!
customer_reviews.author: XtinaG

customer_reviews.title: 1.5% Hyaluronic Acid
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, absorbs easily and you do see the results immediately after application for a few hours. My only cons would be that the pump that comes with the bottle has too much pressure that it splashes the serum everywhere and that the whole bottle only comes with 1.5% of Hyaluronic Acid, will be trying other brands with a higher concentration of hyaluronic acid + vitamin C to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Hello silky smooth skin!
customer_reviews.text: This serum has made my skin so silky smooth! The New England winters can be harsh on the skin and I was getting some dry patches and flakiness on my face even with periodic exfoliation and good quality moisturizers. This enzymatic exfoliating serum has taken away any signs of winter from my face and is very gentle! I’ve never experienced any redness or sensitivity from this product. My makeup glides on and looks fantastic! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy twice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product twice. Loved this it would have given it 5 stars, but this second batch is horrid. Smells bad, super runny, does not hydrate at all. I have no idea what they sent me, but it wasn't the same product at all. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes, glows, and helps sooth wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I'm still in my early 20's, but wanted to start a skin care routine. Many people don't know you're supposed to put this on with your face wet with water, I didn't for the first couple of weeks I used it! Once I changed I immediately felt the difference. The serum soaks up the water and, like, puts it in your face. If you use it consistently you'll notice the difference, I did in my forehead and under my eyes. Do not put it on the sensitive skin above your eyes below your eyebrows, my friend's eyes broke out into a rash. If you use it the right way, it is a great addition to your skin care routine!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product I ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I ever tried! And it's working very well! On myself, great service! This is my third time that I purchased this. AAAAAAAAAAAA+++++++
customer_reviews.author: Rg

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky and no results
customer_reviews.text: Seems to peel off of my face even though I exfoliated. Used it morning and night and still saw no results. Used the entire bottle. Thought I would at least see SOME results based on the reviews and the description of the product. Not entirely unhappy with it but do not believe I would purchase it again. Unfortunately I waited too long to send it back or get a refund, should have not waited to say anything; I was actually hoping for some results by the time the bottle would be empty.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Results?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what this is doing. I’ve used over hyaluronic acid serums and felt it eating away at the top layer of my skin. I could tell it worked. Nothing with this and I don’t really see a difference either. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Humidity Makes a Difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on recommendations from a number of users whose reviews spoke to its effectiveness, particularly given its price. My experience parallels that of another user who wrote that this product has a different impact on skin when used in a humid environment than when used in a dry environment. Having now used it in a mid-western state with high humidity, my experience was entirely different from using it in a desert environment. My conclusion is that its effectiveness seems increased in humid conditions...so customers living in an environment with low humidity should consider looking for help from other products.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Not working (for me at least)
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product. Bought after reading an article where it was highly recommended. Texture feels very watery, no real consistency to it. I applied as it says and it dries my skin immediately, not nourishing, no feeling of moisturizing at all, skin pulls if I do not add a cream. I dont want to throw it so I will mix it with moisturizing cream .. just in case it has some king of benefit and just not working for my dry skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Ig140

customer_reviews.title: Great hydration serum!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other Hyaluronic Acid serums previously, expensive ones double the price so wasn’t sure what to expect. But this one I’m so surprised as to how well it works, my skin is so much more hydrated then previous ones I’ve used. My fine lines around my mouth (smile lines) are not as noticeable after only using it for a couple weeks! Will definitely be purchasing this again and already recommended it to my friends who have bought it and are just as satisfied as I am.
customer_reviews.author: DebSd

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time I purchased. I use Vitamin C Serum ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time I purchased. I use Vitamin C Serum first and follow with the hyaluronic acid Make my skin feel tight and make guides on. Does not sting or burn. Generous amount with bottle size most brands are 1 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Makeup Lover

customer_reviews.title: Must have....5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I'm a licensed esthetician and about 6 years ago, I found a product similar. Before the hoorah of throwing a lil bit of this in every product you see on the shelf. Only problem is, it's usually listed near to last. This is 100% what your skin needs, it will plump your fine lines to the point they will become very unnoticeable, most valuable product every person should own concerned with aging, or dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Truly fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This far exceeded my expectations. Just a couple of drops on a damp face (or for the body in general) dramatically changed the hydration of my skin, which has always been unreasonably and uncomfortably dry. I apply this after a shower (I don't dry off fully), and usually use 2-3 drops per limb/on my torso and follow with a lotion to lock in the moisture (Hempz is lovely).
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all. Sticky after drying.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen no results and I’m almost done with the bottle. It goes on smooth but it leaves your hands sticky and your face kinda tight. Like when have dried up glue on your face. There’s no scent but there is. It’s just a weird scent. I can’t compare to anything. Definitely did not lift any fine lines, dark spots or anything else. Better using vitamin C serum with hyaluronic acids. TruSkin has made a huge difference in my skin and I also use it in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Hong Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product for me
customer_reviews.text: This has been truly a miracle product for me. As I’m aging and getting drier, I require more hydration internally and externally. This serum has assisted me greatly with external hydration. I apply together with Nivea 2-3x a day (evenings as a “mask”) and my skin looks fresh, less “worn” and feels smooth. It wears very well under makeup. I bought this size as a test and will be buying the largest size when I run out. I’ve recently hit the mid-century mark and have been able to stave off fillers in part due to this product, in other part genetics.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tershak

customer_reviews.title: Changed the lid!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I can't imagine my life without it now that I've finished off my first bottle, and have ordered it again! One thing I don't like is the pump spray that came with the product, so I changed the lid to one of the pop-top lids I got from an old shampoo bottle, and now it's so much easier for me to pour it into my hand. I hope that idea will help someone else who doesn't like the pump.
customer_reviews.author: TERIBD

customer_reviews.title: nicest texture I've experienced
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different Hyaluronic Acid serums but this stuff has by far the nicest texture! Unlike all other serums I've tried so far the one from Cosmedica is not watery and thin but nice and thick so that it doesn't "run off" immediately. I use this in combination with the Vitamin C serum and the daily moisturizer (plus the Retinol serum + night cream at night), and I am excited that it visibly reduced the wrinkles on my forehead and especially the "eleven" in between my eyebrows! The texture of all the Cosmedica products is great. Overall the condition of my skin is notably improved - I'm really happy with these products and can recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Aspargus99

customer_reviews.title: If you are grossed out by the gooey feel of other serums, this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well but it seemed too watery for me. Some people love a serum that’s not so mushy or gooey, for those people, this serum is perfect. For me, I need a product that I can put on my fingertips to apply without it running off my finger. I like the gooeyness of Hyaluronic Acid Serum so this one isn’t great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie L.

customer_reviews.title: work very vell
customer_reviews.text: This is really good, and useful. My red and black dots was gone. Just your face may feel dry and tight after use it
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Too early to give a review
customer_reviews.text: I have been asked by the seller to give a review. I have only had the product for 3 weeks. I see no change but that doesnt mean it is not a good product just that the seller is antsy for a review so this is the review as requested
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: Men can use this too
customer_reviews.text: I live in very humid South Florida so HA works here. And it doesn't matter if you are a man or a woman. Wrinkles are wrinkles. I've been using this for a couple of years after I noticed some actual crevices in my face near the eyes! When I use HA, I pat it on as directed but maybe 4 or 5 drops and not just two. After it dries I apply extra virgin coconut oil which my skin loves! Crevices disappear, wrinkles disappear, but age remains the same. LOL I'm satisfied with just looking a bit better than I might otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: J. Keith Tillery

customer_reviews.title: Finally a beauty product that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried lots of different serums; some seem to work and others not at all. I’ve only been using this serum a few days and actually can tell the difference. Already! This makes tired bags under my eyes disappear, lines above my lips almost fully disappear, it made my lips fuller, and some lines between my eyes immediately filled in. I’m so impressed with this product that I told my friends about it today!
customer_reviews.author: Bachan2

customer_reviews.title: They work great together.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this stuff! It really works. My skin has been plump and hydrated since I started using this product. I use it with TruSkin Vitamin C serum as well. They work great together.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen H.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and well worth buying. Will buy again and recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Using it with the new roller in photo. The combination is amazing. Wish I had before and after pics, because I definitely notice a difference. I was very sceptical this would be effective, but it is. I use it all over and under eyes before makeup and it helps fine lines a lot. I also use it a few times a week at night after using the roller. I add a dropper with my moisturizer and it works wonderfully. My skin looks better and is super soft. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Gresham

customer_reviews.title: Simple remedy to clear skin
customer_reviews.text: I have a very simple facial skin routine and it has worked for me for a couple of years now. My skin was never perfect but adding this to my routine, you wouldn't realize I used to pick my face. After I shower I use an apple cider vinegar mixture, then this hyaluronic acid serum, then rose hip oil. BAM! I have the best skin of my life now. This was the secret ingredient to get ride of my dark spots. Give it a try :)
customer_reviews.author: Household

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother buying something more expensive thinking it’ll work better
customer_reviews.text: I’m a true believer in this product. I’m a minimalist when it comes to skin care but this is now part of my daily routine. You don’t have to question whether this is improving your skin because you’ll actually notice it within the first week of use. My husband actually commented on how nice my skin looked. It’s also great that it’s only comprised of 3 ingredients and nothing you can’t pronounce or recognize. Don’t bother buying something more expensive thinking it’ll work better. I also have very sensitive skin and this has not affected me in the least.
customer_reviews.author: Heang

customer_reviews.title: Does work!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product work in that it tightens and makes your skin supple. Unfortunately, it may have caused my skin to break out around my laugh lines and brows. I do use this in conjunction with other products so it could be a combination of ingredients that are causing the reaction. I will need to eliminate products to test it out. But it does work! It reduces fine lines and have reduced my laugh lines and circles under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: BeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and great value!
customer_reviews.text: This serum goes on super smooth and a little goes a long way. The price was great for the size of the bottle. My skin feels hydrated and firm. At night I put a night cream over it since my skin is very dry. This is a great product and a good value. I would recommend trying it.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Is it me?
customer_reviews.text: Mostly everyone is ranting and raving about this product. That is why I bought it. I tried it for a couple of months and I keep getting break outs. My dark spots looks the same. My complexion is still the same (several shades). I am noticing that at times I am plucking hair...that’s new. Is it me? I use it once a day in the morning and sometimes at night. Am I using it wrong? My skin is combination and yes I have eczema. Is that the reason?
customer_reviews.author: Davitrin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The product shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The product shipped fast. I am using this on my pregnant tummy to prevent stretch marks (hopefully). I have only used for a couple weeks but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Sooo amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad my friend recommended this to me! I suffer from a lot of acne scaring, enlarged pores and my skin looking tired. I’m telling you, every time I use this serum, it’s like my skin is rejuvenated and plump! When I wake up in the morning I am shocked at how fresh my skin looks and it seems to shrink my pores, and diminish any fine lines, it is so amazing! I am on my second bottle of this and I know it is a staple in my skin care!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: so this is a fantastic deal. So
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for about a month. Told by an esthetician that it takes about 4 months too see results. She sells this product for over $50, so this is a fantastic deal. So, we shall see. I can barely tell any has been used from my bottle so it should last maybe a year.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn K Moniz

product_meta.title: Cosmedica Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Skin – 4 Fl. Oz Hydrating Facial Moisturizer with Anti-Aging Skin Care Properties. Beauty and Skin Care
product_meta.description: Size:4 Fl OzRejuvenate and replenish the old cells of your skin with Cosmedica Hyaluronic Acid Serum. This skin serum contains pure hyaluronic acid to help provide intense moisture to the skin, making it look naturally bright, appealing and youthful. This face serum is hypoallergenic, paraben-free, cruelty free, vegan skincare essential that does not harm skin or tissues and rejuvenates it from deep within. This skin care product with hyaluronic acid ingredients helps tighten the skin pores, firm facial counters to help reduce fine lines, wrinkles, prevent age spots and pigmentation issues, making it look naturally healthy and beautiful.How To Apply -After cleansing and toning, apply 1-2 drops onto face and décolleté. Use gentle patting motions to promote absorption. Safe to use morning and night. Safe to use on all skin types and hypoallergenic. We recommend pairing with Multi-Active Hydrating Night Cream
feature_bullets: Natural Skin Moisturizer: organic hyaluronic acid serum contains hydrating and plumping properties to combat dryness. 100% pure serum provides intense moisture to your skin, making it look naturally bright and appealing

Skin-friendly Face Lotion: face serum is safe for dry, sensitive skin. Hypoallergenic, paraben-free, cruelty-free, vegan skincare essential provides required moisture to the skin without making it dry

Anti-Aging Serum: skin care moisturizer contains hyaluronic acid, a highly useful ingredient that helps turn back the clock on ageing. It helps reduce fine lines and wrinkles, lift away age spots and brighten up the skin for youthful luminescence

Usage Instruction: skin care serum is light on skin and easy to use. Recommended to apply serum after cleansing and toning your skin. Pat one or two drops of organic serum to promote absorption. Safe to use in the morning as well as night

Multipurpose Skin Serum: this anti-ageing skin care offers multiple benefits to your skin. Apart from hydrating, the serum helps tighten pores, firm facial counters to provide youthful appearance to your skin and helps in treating pigmentation issues
